entities.name: hagrid
entities.description: Hagrid is described as singing 'Odo the Hero' in a corner with another wizard. He is mentioned alongside a squat wizard in a purple porkpie hat.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Ron's drunken uncle is unsure whether Harry is his son.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: Harry is described as spotting an old wizard sitting alone at a table. He is also mentioned as being disguised and the subject of conversation with Elphias Doge.

entities.name: elphias doge
entities.description: Elphias Doge is described as an old wizard with white hair resembling an aged dandelion clock. He is a member of the Order of the Phoenix and wrote Dumbledore's obituary.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned in the context of Elphias Doge writing his obituary.

entities.name: arthur
entities.description: Arthur told Elphias Doge that Harry was at the gathering disguised.

entities.name: order of the phoenix
entities.description: Elphias Doge is a member of the Order of the Phoenix.

relationships.description: Harry approaches Elphias Doge and introduces himself.
Arthur told Elphias Doge that Harry was at the gathering disguised.
Elphias Doge wrote Dumbledore's obituary, and it is mentioned in the context of his conversation with Harry.
Elphias Doge was familiar with Harry before meeting him.
